name: Snake/Guns
description:
This shirt displays the strength of the American Person by paying tribute to the original symbol and warning, "Don't Tread on Me".  The graphic is designed to signify both the Union of States and the individual freedoms that we possess as citizens of this great country.

Printed on a Gildan Ultra Cotton, 6.1oz shirt, the graphic consists of a 3-color silk screen pattern on a white base color to allow the main colors to pop from the black shirt.

For a short time, the purchase of this shirt comes with a red "Freedom" wristband.  You can purchase the white "Liberty" and blue "Individualism" wristbands separately.

I promise that this shirt will turn heads at any function! Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

designed by: Daniel LaMontagne

name: American Caliber Large Logo
description:
This shirt displays the logo of American Caliber Apparel boldly!  Representing the symbol of America in an abstract way, the logo remains as a reminder of the free spirit of the Bald Eagle, with the star in the center to represent the individual that you are and the strength you possess.  The star is red for a reason.  Each individual has the responsibility to remember the blood shed by many to keep us free, in a world full of people that want nothing more than to strip that freedom away.

Printed on a Gildan Ultra Cotton, 6.1oz shirt, the graphic consists of a 2-color silk screen pattern on a white base color to allow the main colors to pop from the black shirt.

For a short time, the purchase of this shirt comes with a blue "Individualism" wristband.  You can purchase the white "Liberty" and red "Freedom" wristbands separately.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

designed by: Daniel LaMontagne

name: AC - USA Flag/Cross
description:
This shirt displays the strength of the American Person by paying tribute to the original symbol and warning, "Don't Tread on Me".  The graphic is designed to make a bold statement about Liberty in the United States of America.  Now more than ever, that liberty is under attack.  Standing strong and preserving your unalienable rights is your duty as a well informed citizen of these United States.

Printed on a Gildan Ultra Cotton, 6.1oz shirt, the graphic consists of a 3-color silk screen pattern on a white base color to allow the main colors to pop from the black shirt.

For a short time, the purchase of this shirt comes with a white "Liberty" wristband.  You can purchase the red "Freedom" and blue "Individualism" wristbands separately.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

designed by: Daniel LaMontagne

name: AC - Flag Red
description:
This shirt displays the flag in a different light.  One color represents the American Person and his/her place in America.  "Old Glory Red" has been chosen for this shirt.

Printed on a Gildan Ultra Cotton, 6.1oz shirt, the graphic consists of a 1-color silk screen pattern on a white base color to allow the main color to pop from the black shirt.

For a short time, the purchase of this shirt comes with a blue "Individualism" wristband.  You can purchase the white "Liberty" and red "Freedom" wristbands separately.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

designed by: Daniel LaMontagne

name: "Freedom" band
description:
The red wristband was chosen for the "Freedom" band.  The blood shed to preserve freedom in this land has been great and we must always honor those that paid the ultimate sacrifice to keep freedom alive for us, as well as those fighting today to maintain that freedom.

The bands are 100% recycled silicone with Debossed lettering that reads, "American Caliber" and "Freedom".  Debossing was chosen to provide a subtile message that is for the individual wearing the band, as a reminder that Freedom is something to cherish and keep safe for future generations of Americans.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

name: "Liberty" Band
description:
The white wristband was chosen for the "Liberty" band.  The purity of the idea of Individual Liberty is something that few people on Earth have ever experienced in Modern times.

The bands are 100% recycled silicone with Debossed lettering that reads, "American Caliber" and "Liberty".  Debossing was chosen to provide a subtile message that is for the individual wearing the band, as a reminder that Liberty is something we should all strive for and maintain for future generations.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

name: "Individualism" Band
description:
The blue wristband was chosen for the "Individualism" band.  The blue field in the "Union" of the flag holds the 50 individual stars representing the Free and Independent States of America.  The United States of America was a vision or Founding Fathers, that Free and Independent States would join in a Union of States, but always maintain their Individualism in that Union.  As time passed, that vision eroded, and a government that resembles a National Government grew.  Today, each state is subordinate to this National Government, losing their Free and Independent status, hence losing their Individualism.

The bands are 100% recycled silicone with Debossed lettering that reads, "American Caliber" and "Individualism".  Debossing was chosen to provide a subtile message that is for the individual wearing the band, as a reminder that they too can lose their Individualism and identity as an American Person if they do not protect it from those that try to place them in some group.

Remember - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism

name: All Three Bands - Freedom, Liberty, Individualism
description: The bands are 100% recycled silicone with Debossed lettering that reads, "American Caliber" on all bands.  Additionally, the red bands have lettering that read, "Freedom", the white bands read, "Liberty" and the blue bands read, "Individualism".  Debossing was chosen to provide a subtile message that is for the individual wearing the bands, as a reminder of the fragile nature of Freedom, Liberty, Individualism.
